title: Dollars and Cents
description: In the book Dollars and Cents, students will read about many types of coins and how many cents they are worth. How are the coins alike? How are they different? Students will have the opportunity to compare and contrast as well as use the information they already know about money. Detailed, supportive photographs, repetitive sentence patterns, and high-frequency words support early readers.
